objects.description: [ZergHelper](https://attack.mitre.org/software/MOB-S0003) "appears to have gotten by Apple’s app review process by performing different behaviors for users from different physical locations...For users outside of China, it would act as what it claimed: an English studying app. However, when accessing the app from China, its real features would appear." Presumably, Apple's app review occurred outside of China and the "real features" were not visible during the review.

external_references.description: Claud Xiao. (2016, February 21). Pirated iOS App Store’s Client Successfully Evaded Apple iOS Code Review. Retrieved December 12, 2016.
